title: !!ONE MONTH FREE!! Townhomes w/ Private Garage near Round Rock!
posting_body: Stunning community open-concept floor plan layouts that come fully equipped with top-tier interior features, including stainless steel appliance, stone countertops, and spa-inspired bathroom and a private garage that will make you feel right at home!
Fantastic amenities including a large Fitness Center, Sundeck with Cabanas and Outdoor Grilling areas with a large resort-style pool for everything you need to unwind in the summer months!
With abundant green spaces around the community and a Pet Cleaning Station, you can take your furry friend out to play and rinse him off without leaving your community!
Great location with a wide variety of fantastic restaurants, from delectable donut shops to fine international cuisine and pleanty of shopping in between!

** As a full-time apartment locator I will work day and night to help you find the perfect apartment here in the beautiful Austin Tx, my service is completely FREE to you so please don't hesitate and call me today!
Check out our Apartment Hunters Facebook and Google pages to see over one hundred 5 star reviews written from past clients and their experience with me!
